name: C R U X
description:
Crux Forest - a place, where paranormal events occurred is being under investigation. The main protagonist, Chloe goes to the forest with her camera to find the evidence of the unknown. 
Crux - is short, atmospheric game, where you can investigate the forest, look for the strange clues, maybe find someone new on the way and most importantly - don't be afraid. 
Thanks everyone for checking out my game. This is my first try, using this software and I am still learning, although constructive criticism and suggestions are very welcome. I do ask, humbly, if you can, to rate the game, leave a comment or make any feedback, whoever you want. Thanks.
